hero.title: Our Work
hero.subtitle: From monitoring humanitarian programs to designing digital solutions, our work spans Yemen's most challenging contexts. We deliver measurable results that strengthen institutions, improve service delivery, and build community resilience.

project1.title: Third Party Monitoring & Evaluation
project1.description: Independent third-party evaluation services for humanitarian and development projects across WASH and Health sectors. Conducted comprehensive assessments to verify program delivery, measure outcomes, and provide evidence-based recommendations for program improvement—ensuring accountability and learning for implementing partners and donors.

project2.title: Financial Performance Analysis
project2.description: Comprehensive analysis of multi-year financial and operational data to diagnose performance challenges. Identified critical deterioration in collection efficiency and accumulated debt patterns, delivering a strategic framework for restructuring financial operations and improving field-level collection mechanisms using data-driven approaches.

project3.title: Mine Action Information Management System
project3.description: Developed comprehensive data collection tools, geographic mapping systems, and performance tracking dashboards for mine action programming. Created high-quality visualization products including interactive maps showing contaminated areas and cleared locations, interactive dashboards, and infographics to support donor engagement and evidence-based prioritization.

project4.title: IT Strategy & Digital Identity
project4.description: Developed a comprehensive digital transformation roadmap for a local non-profit organization, including strategic IT planning aligned with organizational objectives. Designed visual identity systems and digital presence strategy covering social media platforms and website development, enabling the organization to embed digital transformation into administrative operations and program delivery.

project5.title: AI-Powered Health Awareness Platforms
project5.description: Developed innovative AI-driven digital platforms for health awareness and community engagement. MUAFA+ leverages artificial intelligence to deliver personalized health information and guidance, while Afea4Community enables scalable community health education through intelligent content delivery—bringing accessible health knowledge to underserved populations across Yemen.

project6.partner: Global Nutrition Cluster & Yemen Nutrition Cluster
project6.title: Anticipatory Action & Nutrition Capacity Building
project6.description: Delivered multi-day capacity strengthening program on anticipatory action and nutrition for local and national actors. Developed contextualized training materials linking climate risk to nutrition outcomes, facilitated workshops with diverse stakeholders, and produced a national roadmap for integrating nutrition into anticipatory action frameworks with local ownership.

project7.title: Institutional Capacity Building & Compliance Systems
project7.description: Comprehensive institutional strengthening for local civil society organizations including capacity assessments, gap analysis, and development of core organizational systems. Delivered complete policy and manual packages covering governance, financial management, HR, procurement, M&E, safeguarding (PSEA), and program management—enabling partners to meet international donor compliance standards.
